arts.ttl: Exeter fight back to beat struggling rivals Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Jack Fitzwater, Millenic Alli and Jake Richards struck for the home side.

arts.ttl: Bristol Rovers name Brighton's Calderon as new boss
arts.sum: League One side Bristol Rovers appoint Brighton Under-18s manager Inigo Calderon as their new boss.

Exeter finally ended their wait for a League One victory with the 2-1 success at Burton sending them into the festive period on a high. The Grecians haven't won consecutive league outings since Octob...

arts.ttl: Exeter City wanting to give Grecians fans Christmas gift of three points on Boxing Day
arts.sum: IF a new manager bounce was something to be aware of when Exeter City travelled to Burton Albion on Saturday, then they are facing a similar situation for the sell-out Westcountry derby with Bristol Rovers on Boxing Day. “It was a brilliant win and a great performance after a difficult start and going a goal down, a new manager, a stadium full of hope and optimism,” Caldwell said.

arts.ttl: Preview: Exeter City vs. Bristol Rovers - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League One clash between Exeter City and Bristol Rovers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Exeter City captain Pierce Sweeney facing injury absence
arts.sum: Frenchman Crama, who played 34 games on loan at Rovers last season, has been a stand-out player for the Grecians this campaign, but the hope is that he will not be out for long. The Grecians also have Johnly Yfeko recovering from a hamstring injury and while he is back in light training, it will be a few more weeks before the on-loan Rangers man will be back in a City shirt.
